gllvm 1.2.2

Summarizing gllvm model fits

Source: R/summary.gllvm.R
summary.gllvm.Rd

A summary of the fitted 'gllvm' object, including function call, distribution family and model parameters.

# S3 method for gllvm
summary(object, ...)

Arguments

object

an object of class 'gllvm'
...

not used.

Examples

## Load a dataset from the mvabund package
data(antTraits)
y <- as.matrix(antTraits$abund)
# Fit gllvm model
fit <- gllvm(y = y, family = poisson())
summary(fit)
#> $`log-likelihood`
#> [1] -2128.634
#> 
#> $df
#> [1] 122
#> 
#> $AIC
#> [1] 4501.268
#> 
#> $AICc
#> [1] 4178.558
#> 
#> $BIC
#> [1] 4672.214
#> 
#> $Call
#> gllvm(y = y, family = poisson())
#> 
#> $family
#> [1] "poisson"
#>
